issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
There's already a suite of tests for contacts on Android in drillbit, but we need tests on iOS which test full functionality. Because we can't rely on each device/sim having the same contacts information on it, we will need to test the full infrastructure, starting with createPerson/createGroup, setting properties, retrieving them, etc.

Any unit test will necessarily involve secondary verification that these were actually entered into the Contacts DB.
fields.summary: Unit tests for Ti.Contacts on iOS

comments.body: Drillbit is no longer supported, this ticket is now irrelevant.
